questions.question: Who are the sponsors for the ReFi/Regen Bootcamp?
options: B<>rder/ess, CELO, Regen Cordinations, Bitsave Protocol
questions.answer: B<>rder/ess, CELO, Regen Cordinations, Bitsave Protocol

questions.question: In Day 1, during the "Blockchain Tech & Web3 Industry class", what was referred to as the Onchain Tech Mindset?
What are the 3 fundamental things required for onchain commerce?
options: Crypto Tokens, Centralized Exchanges, Decentralized Exchanges

questions.question: What are the 3 C's of Money and Finance in web3?
options: Community Airdrops, Collab Trades, Command Trades
Celo Public Goods, Centralized Exchanges, Celo Stable coins

questions.question: According to Favour Ekeleme (Pluto Dev) what type of web3 Jobs are available?
What roles are advisable for a newbie wanting to get a web3 job because it helps you learn in-demand skills and give you access?
Which statement was NOT made during the Job Opportunities in Regen/Refi X-Space
options: You have to learn the skill
You have to pursue the skill
You have to learn how to offer the skill
You have to learn how to value the skill
questions.answer: You have to pursue the skill

questions.question: Which project was used as a case study for ecological regeneration?
Which of the following statements best describes Regeneration Finance in web3?
options: Regeneration is about scaling centralised platforms for efficiency and speed.
Regeneration is focused on getting rich quickly through speculative crypto trading.
The process of restoring, or improving ecosystems, communities, and economies using collaborative and sustainable approaches with Onchain tools to track or reward impact.
Regeneration means using AI to automate traditional financial systems.
questions.answer: The process of restoring, or improving ecosystems, communities, and economies using collaborative and sustainable approaches with Onchain tools to track or reward impact.

questions.question: Which of these statements was NOT mentioned by Wasabi during his session?
options: ReFI Uses blockchain & smart contracts for transparent impact funding, measurement, and reporting.
ReFi Rewards real-world regeneration (carbon capture & reduction, biodiversity)
ReFi Aligns financial returns with ecological outcomes & Enables community governance & fair value capture
ReFi is a public good that seeks to create impact for web3 ecosystems and real life ecosystems.
questions.answer: ReFi is a public good that seeks to create impact for web3 ecosystems and real life ecosystems.

questions.question: During the Who is a Regen X-space, what did KarlaGod describe a Regen as?
options: One who works a Regen job
One who is a Regen Community Mod
One who provides value in and contributes to the ReFi ecosystem
One who is a Public Good
questions.answer: One who provides value in and contributes to the ReFi ecosystem

questions.question: Complete this statement “Every Regen must have an _________”
Pick the odd one out
How did Christwin connect leadership to the development of Metering Protocol?
options: He focused solely on marketing hype
He emphasized vision, consistent action, and building in public with community involvement
He hired a large centralized team from the start
He relied on anonymous developers to ship products
questions.answer: He emphasized vision, consistent action, and building in public with community involvement

questions.question: What lesson did Christwin emphasize for those looking to build in ReFi or social regeneration?
options: Focus on airdrops and token prices
Start with real-world problems, build in public, and lead with purpose
Copy popular projects from other ecosystems
questions.answer: Start with real-world problems, build in public, and lead with purpose

questions.question: What impact category does Christwin’s Metering Protocol solution belong in?
During the class with Monty From CeLo network, what ReFi project can you create a local node on and begin to contribute?
What PDF was recommended to begin studying to learn more about ReFi ecosystem?
What tool was presented during the session with Monty that gives you ReFi Onchain Credentials.
What platform shows you ReFI tokens launched in the ecosystem and allows you trade/swap them.
What is tokenization in ReFi?
options: Representing real-world or impact assets on-chain
questions.answer: Representing real-world or impact assets on-chain
